Ensures the icon is properly displayed when network request blocking setting is enabled/disabled.

Is blocking: false
Has Entries: false
Does Not Have Icon

Loading Network Module
Network Module Loaded
Is blocking: false
Has Entries: false
Does Not Have Icon

Is blocking: true
Has Entries: false
Does Not Have Icon

Is blocking: true
Has Entries: true
Has Icon

Has Entries: true
Does Not Have Icon
